dict.acceptation: 住宅的，适于作住宅的；与居住有关的；适宜作住宅的；

sent.orig: We advocate such a life-style whether residential or commercial &residential.
sent.trans: 无论我们做住宅、商住两用房，都倡导这样的生活方式。

sent.orig: Residential west, east, even the residential front, rear section then the whole Church.
sent.trans: 西邻居民住宅，东边前部连居民住宅，后部接全节堂。

sent.trans: 永中街道罗东锦苑住宅区2001年被建设部评为国家级小康住宅示范小区。

sent.orig: The city was mainly divided into commercial, high-rise residential and low-rise residential districts.
sent.trans: 市内分成商业区、层住宅区及低层平房区。
